content: Fantastic case study, Stacey. Great examples for pain points identification and resolution, and really well written! The very fact that the manufacturer has since addressed one of the items stands to validate your findings… whether they did so in response to your publication or whether their own UXers arrived at the same conclusion independently. As fellow UXer I love hearing or reading about independent, self-initiated studies like yours. Congrats, and accolades well deserved!
